snippet: Adobe Systems said it was doubling the maternity leave it grants, the third American technology company in a week to give new parents more paid time off.
abstract: Adobe Systems increases paid maternity leave for employees from 12 weeks to 26 weeks and grants 16 weeks paid parental leave for primary caregivers and new parents.
lead_paragraph: Adobe Systems said it was doubling the maternity leave it grants, the third American technology company in a week to give new parents more paid time off.

headline.main: Adobe to Double Leave It Offers to New Mothers
